name: Blocks Brain Fill
description:
The game’s aim is simple you have to make gapless horizontal and vertical lines, in a 10 x 10 game grid, which get removed. Clear as many lines as possible and keep the grid clutter free.

Highlight:
- A 1010! classic block mania game with tetris style. Simple play and easy control
- Beautiful design and many various skins for choice
- Different game modes for challengers
- Smoothly, no crash, no harmful battery
- Attracted sound effects
